text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Commission" means the State Health Services Cost Review Commission.

"Facility" means, whether operated for a profit or not:
Any hospital; or
Any related institution.

section.section:
"Hospital services" means:
Inpatient hospital services as enumerated in Medicare Regulation 42 C.F.R. § 409.10, as amended;
Emergency services, including services provided at:
Freestanding medical facility pilot projects authorized under Subtitle 3A of this title prior to January 1, 2008; and
A freestanding medical facility issued a certificate of need by the Maryland Health Care Commission after July 1, 2015;
Outpatient services provided at the hospital; and
Identified physician services for which a facility has Commission-approved rates on June 30, 1985.

"Hospital services" does not include:
Outpatient renal dialysis services; or
Outpatient services provided at a limited service hospital as defined in § 19-301 of this title, except for emergency services.

"Related institution" means an institution that is licensed by the Department as:
A comprehensive care facility that is currently regulated by the Commission; or
An intermediate care facility-intellectual disability.
"Related institution" includes any institution in paragraph (1) of this subsection, as reclassified from time to time by law.
